health_tech: FHIR API for Electronic Health Records (EHR) Integration
integration_patterns: Data Storage and Processing using Amazon S3 and Snowflake

evidence.claim: Exin Health AI utilizes AWS services for serverless computing and data storage solutions.
The platform supports FHIR APIs for seamless health data integrations.
Exin Health is compliant with HIPAA for managing patient data securely.
The platform includes support for X12 transaction sets relevant to healthcare pricing and claims.

icp.icp_reason: Supports multiple X12 transactions and API integrations.
matched_use_cases: Real-time Data Ingestion for Claims Processing
